sentence: What did the father buffalo say when his son went off to college? bison.
explanation: Bison refers to a type of large animal found in North America. Bison is also a play on the phrase bye, son
first_new_sentence: The bison is grazing in the field during the summer.
second_new_sentence: The father told his son goodbye as he left for college.
